org.dyn4j

Class UnitConversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyn4j.UnitConversion

  • public class UnitConversion
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to convert units.

    Dyn4j by default uses meters-kilograms-seconds (MKS) units. This class can be used to convert to and from MKS.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.3
    Author:
    William Bittle
